tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_data (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    layer_id INT,
    input_data BLOB,
    output_data BLOB,
    FOREIGN KEY (layer_id) REFERENCES neural_network_layers(layer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fine_tuning_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    training_id INT,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (training_id) REFERENCES training_data(training_id)
);
